name: Shubham Verma
preface: Aspiring full stack developer and competitive programmer.

projects.preface: A great place to be chit-chat with your friends.üßôüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚≠ê
projects.projectDesc: A full-stack Real-time chat application with User Authentication using JWT and bcryptJS. Used socket.io for real-time communication and group creation. Used React Context API for global state management.

projects.preface: Transfer files over WiFi back and forth all devices from your terminal
projects.projectDesc: Airshare is a Python-based CLI tool and module that lets you transfer data between two machines in a local network, P2P, using Multicast-DNS. It also opens an HTTP gateway for other non-CLI external interfaces. It works completely offline! Built with aiohttp and zeroconf

projects.preface: VR React360 app that connects like-minded peers and allows you to watch anything together!
projects.projectDesc: A React 360 web app that allows friends and strangers to watch anything together peer to peer using WebRTC and web-sockets. Wrote open source adapters to integrate firebase / reusable listeners in React 360.  Among the top 8 that Qualified for globals out of 12,100. Won 5000$USD for first place in India.

projects.preface: Pure Javascript module to send data through ultrasonic waves
projects.projectDesc: Javascript module to send data in ultrasonic sound programatically and decoding the data through a realtime fast fourier transform (Data through audio in the web)

projects.preface: A CLI module which builds a Portfolio site in React... Sounds Interesting???
projects.projectDesc: A CLI based Portfolio builder that only asks you to enter your details in a json file and builds a minimilastic react portfolio based on it. Super simple to use and a great way to show off your cool projects! Also the entire portfolio your viewing was built using the sameüòâ

Built a scalable web application using Vanilla JavaScript for SSN INSTINCTS(National level cultural fest) 2K19. The entire site was built within 7 days to impress/onboard various sponsors for the event!

experience.title: Google Summer of Code
experience.content: Created Web Accessibility Plugin for Joomla! CMS, which is one of the most used content management systems. Used HTML, CSS and JavaScript and impplemented features like Disable Page Animations,Increase/decrease line Height, Activate Dyslexic Font etc. Has 700+ Weekly Downloads over npm registry.
